channel.title: Follow(delta)

item.title: Follow(delta)
item.dc:creator: @n0_limit_k0 n0_limit_k0
item.description:
@n0_limit_k0 wrote:

hey guyz, recentily i had a problem,

when ever i barraged a player he coun’t stop following me…

then i searched some site’s and found this.

if (MagicHandler.itFreezes){ return; }

some1 told me to add that under this.

} if (isInAssault()){ sM("You can't follow in assault!"); return;

so i did and "yes"this time barraged works perfect. But now when a player click to follow me he cant. well he can click follow but when i walk the player just stands there not follow:(

then i searched for more information and some1 said add this:

if (entangleDelay > 0) { return; }

under you attacking and following case but i cannot find the case

so can any1 plz tell me what is bes to use? this problem is annoying and if a barrage cannot freeze a player @ one place then its not good Playerkilling:(

help me out plz:)

Read full topic
